TopicTitle: How could I get a expected landing coordinates with kRPC and if its possible, with Trajectories mod?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to make a landing program with kRPC for my craft, but cant find how to get a data from other mods. I tried to find to get a landing coordinates with kRPC.Mechjeb2, but there was no info in documentation.

Also i tried to export landing coordinates to txt file with edting with visual studio, but I couldn't build mod. (With .dll references)

I can write codes if i know steps to calculate landing coordinates but i dont know anything about the prediction.
